output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: Not present in this post, though not mandatory for all communications.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Simion" who is GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION, a registered presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram, targeting a potential audience of over 1 million people, specifically in Botoșani area.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, this clearly has an electoral objective: - Uses hashtags #VoteazăAUR - Promotes "Planul Simion" - Is explicitly political in nature - Is clearly trying to influence voters
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content. It's a direct campaign message promoting a candidate and their plan.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official paid advertisement from a party-affiliated page "Alegerea de AUR".
The timing of this advertisement (after November 20, 2024) and its continuation past the electoral propaganda period for presidential elections makes it problematic.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Simion) - Uses explicit electoral messaging (#VoteazăAUR) - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Has clear electoral objectives - Is running after the end of the legal propaganda period
conclusion.message-for-police: Pagina "Alegerea de AUR", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential George Nicolae Simion (AUR) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Postarea cu ID-ul 1123473639412728 promoveaza in mod direct candidatul si planul sau electoral pentru Botosani, folosind explicit indemnul la vot (#VoteazaAUR) si este o reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, ceea ce constituie propaganda electorala ilegala in perioada post-campanie.
